about_the_game:
Eternal Rome is a city-building simulation game that allows you to become a mayor of a Roman city in modern times. Get ready to research new technologies and unlock modern infrastructure. Power your city with state-of-the-art developments ranging from wind farms to nuclear power plants. Create an advanced transit system — let the Romans navigate the city with the monorail and passenger drones. And finally, complete the megaproject — build a spaceship and send the first Roman into space!

Extensive Electrification

The Romans learned to produce electricity. Get it using a variety of methods — install windmills on hills, solar panels in open spaces, and finally, research uranium enrichment and build a nuclear power plant. Run the power grid and keep it safe — without electricity, the entire city will quickly cease to function. Make Rome a city of lights!


Advanced Transit System

The Romans used to walk or ride horses. It's time for new technologies — develop a public transport network in your city. Lay tram routes on the boulevards, convert the aqueduct into a monorail, and create a network of delivery drones with Roman pizza!


Roman Space Program

Rome has always wanted to expand its borders. It's time to look into space. Study a separate branch of technology related to space exploration. Build all the necessary facilities to manufacture every part of the spaceship, choose a team of future astronauts, and send them on an expedition to the moon.

Wishlist to be notified upon release
